entry.p: Fixed a bug that prevented hover options on a User Profile from functioning in App Content.
Fixed a bug in all apps to remove content titles for RSS content when it matches the link attachment title.
Enhanced Comments to comply with accessibility standards by providing better support for screen readers and making sure all interactive items can be reached with keyboard-only navigation.
Fixed a bug in Comments that was displaying the embed code over videos in some instances.
Enhanced Livefyre Identity to comply with accessibility standards by providing better support for screen readers and making sure all interactive items can be reached with keyboard-only navigation.
Enhanced Polls to sharpen and improve image quality when uploaded in Designer.
Fixed a bug that was preventing rating edits to appear appropriately.
Added an enhancement to disallow bit.ly links from being used in Instagram Rights Account Settings to prevent requests from being marked as spam.
Fixed a bug that prevented the rights modal from closing after sending a request on an asset in Library.
Fixed a bug that prevented Custom Profanity lists from being reliably updated.
Fixed a bug that prevented Profile Pull URLs from saving in Studio Settings.
Enhanced Sidenotes to comply with accessibility standards by providing better support for screen readers and making sure all interactive items can be reached with keyboard-only navigation.
Added a feature that displays a notification when an asset is reported.
Fixed a bug that caused Premoderate and Media Premoderate stream rules settings reverting to defaults after saving.
Fixed a bug that prevented map locations from being cleared in a Twitter Stream Rule.
Fixed a bug that prevented site-restricted app & content managers from seeing the App Content button in Library.
Fixed a bug that under certain circumstances caused the Site checklist in User Roles becoming unusable.
The default Comments and Sidenotes avatars and buttons will now have increased color contrast to meet accessibility standards.
Enhanced Livefyre Identity to support keyboard navigation to meet accessibility standards.
Enhanced Facebook Page Rules to ingest high quality Facebook images where before we ingested only the thumbnails.
Enhanced Library Asset search to support Japanese characters.
